name: 洪揮霖
objective: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、創新思考和解決問題能力，以建立同學未來學習統計學、經濟學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
schedule:
1. Review the rules of differentiation and integration.
2.  Techniques of integration and improper integrals
3. Applications of integration: areas between curves
4. Applications of integration: volumes (disk method)
5. Applications of integration: volumes (cylindrical shell method)
6.  Applications of integration: arc length & surface areas
7.  Applications of integration:other applications
8.  Parametric equations &polar coordinate system
9. Midterm & polar curves
10. Vector space
11. partial derivatives
12. directional derivatives and gradient
13. Applications of partial derivatives
14. Multiple integrals
15. Multiple integrals
16. Final exam
17. Series
18. Series
scorePolicy:
Performance 35%(containing quiz)      
First examination 5% (date:2/20  contents:all in the first semester)
Midterm 30%       Final Exam 30%
Late  －1       Absence  －2
